skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Bremen-born destroyer Z36, known by many as the Devilish Idol! My friends and I travelled throughout the Baltic Sea, but eventually I was dragged into that deep, black abyss... Hmph. In any case, I'll bring you victory with my powers of bewitchment!
skins.acquisition: Hm hm~ so you're my Commander? Our meeting must have been ordained by the Fates. By the Iron Blood coursing through my veins, the Devilish Idol Z36 binds herself to your service! Shazam!
skins.login: Ohh, you came at just the right time! Hm, want to listen to my brand new song? It's called "Devilish Overture!"
skins.details: Hmhmm~ what do you think about my bewitching heterochromatic eyes? H-hey! They're not contacts!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, have you seen F¨¹nf? I granted her some of my devilish powers, but then suddenly lost the ability to detect her with my bewitching eyes... Huh? Oh, she's right there?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Nobody can resist the bewitching songs of the Devilish Idol!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Whether it's on the battlefield or on the stage, once I release my sealed powers, nothing can get in my way~!
skins.secretaryTouch: W-wait! Even if it's you, Commander, I won't let you unwrap- I mean, unseal my powers! No way! Nuu~!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You'll get hexed for casually touching the Devilish Idol's body!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Bear witness to my devilish procession! Wh-what... Commander, I won't grow any taller if you keep patting me like that!
